column2: Be glad at banquet, warrior worthy!
column3: Be glad at banquet, warrior worthy!

column2: The wave-roamer bode riding at anchor, its owner awaiting. As they hastened onward, Hrothgar's gift they lauded at length.
column3: The wave roamer bode riding at anchor, its owner awaiting. As they hastened onward, Hrothgar's gift they lauded at length.

column2: -- 'Twas a lord unpeered, every way blameless, till age had broken -- it spareth no mortal -- his splendid might.
column3: -- 'twas a lord unpeered, every way blameless, till age had broken -- it spareth no mortal -- his splendid might.
